name: project_short_name
description: TCGA project abbreviation, eg TCGA-BRCA (ISB-CGC added column)

name: case_barcode
description: TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-AP-A1DV (ISB-CGC added column)

name: sample_barcode
description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-AP-A1DV-01A (ISB-CGC added column)

name: aliquot_barcode
description: TCGA aliquot barcode, eg TCGA-AP-A1DV-10A-01D-A135-09 (ISB-CGC added column)

name: fileUUID
description: GDC identifier for file with this data (ISB-CGC added column)
